Sentencas: This work assesses experimentally the feasibility of feeding a high tar load product gas from biomass gasification to a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for renewable electricity generation.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cell on biomass product gas with tar levels > 10 g Nm-3

Sentencas: The SOFC had a nickel gadolinium-doped ceria anode (Ni-GDC) and the gasifierwas a pilot scale circulating fluidized bed, employing hot gas-cleaning to remove particulates, HCl and H2S. The SOFC operated for several hours on either pre-reformed gas (reduced tar levels < 0.5 g Nm(-3)) as well as on high tar-laden wood gas (tar levels > 10 g Nm(-3)) i.e. with no pre-reforming of tars.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cell on biomass product gas with tar levels > 10 g Nm-3

Sentencas: The tests were carried out at low fuel utilization U-f ofaround 20% at a current density j = 130 mA cm(-2).
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cell on biomass product gas with tar levels > 10 g Nm-3

Sentencas: In all cases stable continuous SOFC performance was established.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cell on biomass product gas with tar levels > 10 g Nm-3

Sentencas: Post experimental examination of the SOFC showed that the anode was not affected by carbon deposition or other impurity accumulation.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cell on biomass product gas with tar levels > 10 g Nm-3
